Click to view events for April 13

tr.td:
13
Apr 13
6:00 PM to 7:00 PM
Cancelled - Regular Board Meeting
Location: MHS CAT Lab
Calendar: Board of Education
The Regular Board Meeting of the Montague Area Public Schools Board of Education scheduled for Monday, April 13, 2020 at 6:00 p.m. has been cancelled as allowed by Governor Whitmer’s Executive Orders 2020-02 and 2020-15. The next meeting is scheduled for Monday, May 11 at 6:00 p.m.
If you have any questions, please contact Jeffrey Johnson, Superintendent, at 231-893-1515 or johnsonj@mapsk12.org.

a.title: View more about HS Zoom Meeting

div.p: We are asking all families whose income has recently changed to fill out a NEW Free/Reduced Lunch Application.

p.img: Montague Area Public Schools is an outstanding school system with dedicated students, highly qualified staff, administration, Board of Education, parents, and community committed to providing the best educational programs.

div.div: District Learning Plan - Letter To Parents

div.p: MAPS has been working on a comprehensive plan to continue educating students through the use of distance learning strategies. Please read this Letter To Parents that includes information about our educational plan for the remainder of our school year.

During this school closure. Meal service will be provided on Tuesdays only, and will provide one week's worth of breakfasts and lunches. This plan will limit the exposure for families receiving meals and our employees who are providing meals.
The Schools of Choice window for the 20-21 school year is May 1 - May 30. Parents may fill out a Schools of Choice request via an online link that will be posted on our website and Facebook on May 1.
